div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 393px; margin-left: 433px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
It manages Deeper Connect devices
Status, e.g., server registry, online state

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 66px; margin-left: 439px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
It manages Deeper Connect devices
credit and provides an interface for
other pallets to increase / slash devices
creditÂ

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 59px; margin-left: 12px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
It manages micropayment channels
between Deeper Connect devices

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 227px; margin-left: 220px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
It's based on Substrate staking pallet.
It allows Deeper Connect devices to
delegate their credit to a validator
to earn rewardsÂ
